mutants.code:
def max_opponent_happiness(n, m, k, A):
    m1 = max(A)
    A.pop(A.index(m1))
    m2 = max(A)
    l = m // k
    sum1 = m1 * m
    sum1 += m // (k + 1) * (m1 - m2)
    return sum1

def max_opponent_happiness(n, m, k, A):
    m1 = max(A)
    A.pop(A.index(m1))
    m2 = max(A)
    l = m / k
    sum1 = m1 * m
    sum1 -= m // (k + 1) * (m1 - m2)
    return sum1
